code: import React from'react';import'./AnimeList.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AnimeList=_ref=>{let{items}=_ref;const copyToClipboard=()=>{const textToCopy=items.join('\n');navigator.clipboard.writeText(textToCopy).then(()=>alert('List copied to clipboard!')).catch(err=>console.error('Failed to copy: ',err));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"results-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"results-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Filtered Anime List (",items.length," unique series)"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:copyToClipboard,className:"copy-button",children:"Copy to Clipboard"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"anime-list",children:items.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"anime-item",children:item},index))})]});};export default AnimeList;
